name: acupuncturist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is trained to do acupuncture (= a treatment for pain or illness using thin needles put into the skin in particular places around the body): Acupuncture is an extremely safe treatment if done by a certified acupuncturist. She was managing her asthma with help from an acupuncturist.
More examplesFewer examplesThe acupuncturist can control the intensity of the treatment to make sure it is comfortable for you.You will need to find an expert acupuncturist if you are considering acupuncture for sinus headaches.He underwent nine treatments from a trained acupuncturist. You must tell your acupuncturist if you are pregnant.For low back pain, the acupuncturist will first identify the specific acupuncture channels which are blocked.
